snippet: Gov. Mary Fallin asked Oklahoma’s Health Care Authority to cut its contracts with two Planned Parenthood affiliates, citing high rates of billing errors.
abstract: Oklahoma Gov Mary Fallin requests that state's Health Care Authority end contracts with two affiliates of Planned Parenthood due to high billing error rates.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Mary Fallin asked Oklahoma’s Health Care Authority to cut its contracts with two Planned Parenthood affiliates, citing high rates of billing errors.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Governor Seeks to End Planned Parenthood Funding
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Governor Seeks to End Planned Parenthood Funding
